id.description: The unique identifier of the channel member.

@odata.type.description: The type of data represented by the object.

displayName.description: The display name of the channel member.

roles.description: The roles assigned to the channel member within the channel.

items.description: Individual role assigned to the channel member.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user associated with the channel member.

email.description: The email address of the channel member.

channelId.description: The unique identifier of the channel the member belongs to.

tenantId.description: The unique identifier of the tenant to which the channel member belongs.

visibleHistoryStartDateTime.description: The date and time from which the channel member's history is visible.
